attributes.action: End the UK coronavirus lockdown now.
attributes.additional_details:
This lockdown is extremely damaging to businesses and livelihoods alike. It is also damaging to the personal mental health of the citizens of this country. A study by a Glasgow university found that the previous lockdown led to a "creeping rise" in suicidal thoughts in persons aged 18-29 years, rising from 8% to 10%, The University Of Glasgow found.

With the forced closure of businesses such as salons, art painting stores & cinemas, there will be a considerable negative impact on the economy.
attributes.background: End the UK coronavirus lockdown immediately. Repeal the restrictions on leaving home, business trading and travel, that has arisen as part of the current coronavirus lockdown.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Repeal second National Lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
